channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tourism has hijacked Santorini’s wine production as agricultural land becomes exorbitant while visitor numbers continue to climb
item.description: The island is expecting 3.4 million tourists this summer, despite local authorities asking for limits since 2012.

item.title: Global leaders react to 'true friend' Biden dropping out of U.S. presidential race
item.description: Foreign leaders reacted to U.S. President Joe Biden's decision to exit the presidential race.

item.title: How stocks performed the last time a president ended a re-election bid — in 1968
World leaders praise Biden’s record after he quits presidential race
item.description: "Ukraine is grateful to President Biden for his unwavering support for Ukraine’s fight for freedom, which, along with strong bipartisan support in the United States, has been and continues to be critical."

item.title: Asia stocks fall as Biden drops presidential bid; China unexpectedly cuts interest rates
item.description: "It is in the best interest of my party and the country for me to stand down and to focus solely on fulfilling my duties as President,” Biden wrote in a letter.

item.title: Stock futures inch higher, but Biden’s withdrawal adds to market's uncertainty
Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer won’t challenge Kamala Harris for presidential nomination
item.description: California’s Democratic governor Gavin Newsom is also reportedly preparing to stand down.

item.title: As the super-rich pile into alternatives, a top investment manager reveals how others can too
item.description: Private markets enable the wealthy to "enhance their returns and grow their wealth," said Hamilton Lane's Juan Delgado-Moreira.

item.title: Who might be the Democratic VP nominee now? Here’s what betting markets say.
Here’s how Wall Street and business leaders are reacting to Biden’s exit from the presidential race; ‘Father time is undefeated’
item.description: "Biden stepping down is a whole new level of political uncertainty. This may be the catalyst for market volatility that is overdue."

item.title: Bank of America strategist says it's time to get bearish
item.description: The Wall Street bank's strategist says he expects stocks in one region to slide 15%.

item.title: Stock futures inch higher, but Biden’s withdrawal adds to uncertainty
Now that Joe Biden has dropped out of the race, what happens to his campaign money?
item.description: "A major party’s presumptive nominee stepping down months before Election Day is not an ordinary event, but it is also not a crisis."

item.title: Kamala Harris sees surge in big money support after Biden drops out of race
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris is already taking control of Joe Biden's massive campaign war chest after his departure from the 2024 race.

item.title: Kamala Harris has a nearly 40% chance of beating Trump, bookies say
